replies.body: True, I own every teemo skin and have one tricked him since 2015

Does Google actually bring up Satan's age? Since when did Google have the definitive answer to such a bizarre question?!?

guys, as there are many young people reading this (not like im not one of them but :d), keep in mind this is a meme! Acc to the Bible ancestry (quite too detailed tbh) and the Hebrew calendar, since Adam and Eve ate from the tree to know good and evil have passed ~6,000 years and... we know nothing else

just google is, google again and is giving very old (several centuries to 1-2k years) information, although who knows :p still, the wiki article also states it.. well, in the end

As a Teemo Main, You shall be hated by the community, especially adcs and other champions who rely on auto's
The most common enemy top laner I'm up against besides Garen... yay.

Actually the modern idea on Satan is way newer than 8000 years old. Obviously it's a slow metamorphosis of the character from its earliest mentions to its current form, but a lot of how he's imagined today is based on Paradise Lost, from the 17th century, so that'd be a more accurate "release date".
